mapper.sql: v_elevator_id , v_elevator_code, v_elevator_name, i_province_id, i_city_id, i_area_id, v_address, i_elevator_type, i_elevator_use_type, i_elevator_place_type, v_elevator_brand_id, i_maintain_days, d_last_maintain_date, d_next_maintain_date, d_last_inspect_date, d_next_inspect_date, v_maintain_company_id, v_property_company_id, i_government_id, v_maintain_person_name, v_maintain_person_tel, v_emergency_person_name, v_emergency_person_tel, v_http_pt_codes, v_longitude, v_latitude, i_coordinate_type, v_project_id, v_village_id, i_install_status, dt_install_time, i_on_line, i_mode_status, i_fault_status, i_max_floor, i_min_floor, v_floor_detail, v_floor_setting_status, dc_speed, bi_run_count, bi_door_count, bi_bend_count, bi_level_trigger_count, bi_run_distance_count, i_dt, i_dt1, i_dt2, i_nps, i_npr, dc_ndaj, i_angle, i_angle_type, v_sgln_code, v_unit_code, v_leave_factory_number, v_manufacturer_code, v_equipment_code, v_registration_authority, v_registration_mechanism, v_registration_certificate_no, dt_create_time, dt_modify_time, v_create_user_id, v_modify_user_id, i_del_flag, i_pm_status, night_watch_status, night_watch_start_time, night_watch_end_time , property_safe_man , property_safe_phone , maintain_principal_person , maintain_principal_phone , maintain_subordinate_person , maintain_subordinate_phone , maintain_equ_insurance_info , maintain_emergency_phone , gcj02_longitude , gcj02_latitude , lift_gate , show_floor , traction , has_insurance , have_house , examine_date , installation_date , model_name , examine_entities , maintenance_participate_in_date , use_unit_phone , next_inspection_date , inspection_unit , insurance_status , insurance_type , contractor , contractor_start , contractor_end , control_mode , normal_rise_height , normal_angle , normal_width , normal_length
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_elevator where v_elevator_code = #{vElevatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by dt_modify_time desc limit 0,1

insert into tbl_elevator (v_elevator_id ,v_elevator_code, v_elevator_name, v_project_id, v_village_id, v_address, v_equipment_code, dt_create_time, dt_modify_time, v_create_user_id, v_modify_user_id, i_del_flag) values
(#{item.vElevatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vElevatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vElevatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vProjectId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vVillageId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vEquipmentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dtCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.dtModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.vCreateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iDelFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update tbl_elevator
v_elevator_code = #{vElevatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_elevator_name = #{vElevatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_province_id = #{iProvinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_city_id = #{iCityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_area_id = #{iAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v_address = #{vAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_elevator_type = #{iElevatorType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_elevator_use_type = #{iElevatorUseType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_elevator_place_type = #{iElevatorPlaceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

v_maintain_company_id = #{vMaintainCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_property_company_id = #{vPropertyCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

v_maintain_person_name = #{vMaintainPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_maintain_person_tel = #{vMaintainPersonTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_emergency_person_name = #{vEmergencyPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_emergency_person_tel = #{vEmergencyPersonTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_http_pt_codes = #{vHttpPtCodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_longitude = #{vLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_latitude = #{vLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_coordinate_type = #{iCoordinateType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v_project_id = #{vProjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_village_id = #{vVillageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_install_status = #{iInstallStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dt_install_time = #{dtInstallTime,jdbcType=OTHER},
i_on_line = #{iOnLine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_mode_status = #{iModeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_fault_status = #{iFaultStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_max_floor = #{iMaxFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_min_floor = #{iMinFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v_floor_detail = #{vFloorDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_floor_setting_status = #{vFloorSettingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dc_speed = #{dcSpeed,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
bi_run_count = #{biRunCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bi_door_count = #{biDoorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bi_bend_count = #{biBendCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bi_level_trigger_count = #{biLevelTriggerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bi_run_distance_count = #{biRunDistanceCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_dt = #{iDt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_dt1 = #{iDt1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_dt2 = #{iDt2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_nps = #{iNps,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_npr = #{iNpr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dc_ndaj = #{dcNdaj,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
i_angle = #{iAngle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_angle_type = #{iAngleType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v_sgln_code = #{vSglnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_unit_code = #{vUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_leave_factory_number = #{vLeaveFactoryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_manufacturer_code = #{vManufacturerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_equipment_code = #{vEquipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_registration_authority = #{vRegistrationAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_registration_mechanism = #{vRegistrationMechanism,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_registration_certificate_no = #{vRegistrationCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where v_elevator_id = #{vElevatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
delete from tbl_elevator where v_elevator_id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select v_elevator_code from tbl_elevator where v_elevator_code in
#{item}

select ifnull(count(1), 0) as count, i_pm_status as pmStatus, case when i_pm_status = 1 then "待现勘" when i_pm_status = 2 then "待配货" when i_pm_status = 3 then "待安装" when i_pm_status = 4 then "待调测" when i_pm_status = 5 then "待验收" when i_pm_status = 6 then "运行中" when i_pm_status = 7 then "托管" when i_pm_status = 11 then "现勘中" when i_pm_status = 12 then "配货中" when i_pm_status = 13 then "安装中" when i_pm_status = 14 then "调测中" when i_pm_status = 15 then "验收中" else "待现勘" end as pmStatusName from tbl_elevator where v_village_id = #{vVillageId} and i_del_flag = 0 group by pmStatus

select project.v_project_name as vProjectName, village.v_village_name as vVillageName, dept.v_dept_name as vDeptName, elevator.v_elevator_name as vElevatorName, elevator.v_address as vAddress, elevator.v_equipment_code as vEquipmentCode, brand.v_elevator_brand_name as vElevatorBrandName from tbl_elevator as elevator left join tbl_elevator_brand brand on brand.v_elevator_brand_id = elevator.v_elevator_brand_id left join tbl_project as project on elevator.v_project_id = project.v_project_id left join tbl_village as village on elevator.v_village_id = village.v_village_id left join tbl_sys_dept as dept on project.v_dept_id = dept.v_dept_id where elevator.v_elevator_id = #{elevatorId} and elevator.i_del_flag = 0
